operational.translation[0].definitions[0: working and ready to be used
The boat should be operational by this afternoon.
The new system became operational in March.
Our main offices are now fully operational.
operational.translation[0].definitions[1: relating to the operation of a business, government etc
Patco accepted full responsibility for operational management.
operational.translation[1].definitions[0: working or able to be used
Even when the new system is fully operational it will be subject to important conditions.
The power station will become operational next year.
These vehicles have an operational life of five years.
